name: Forest: Stay on your path
description:
This serious game was made in the span of one week during the summer university at ATU Sligo. The game is about the land use conflict of forests, the purpose is for the player to see how their actions have impact on the forest. Players have to maintain nature, economy and happiness. You do this by saying yes or no to questions about how the forest is going to be used. The enviroment changes based on the players choices.

The game is just a prototype made for the summer university and is very unlikely to get updated.
